long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Merch makes it easy to create and update your Merch by Amazon design descriptions. Simply, save an existing design description from your previous design, then select your description when creating or updating your design. Quick Merch reduces the time and effort required to update your design from minutes to seconds, so you can focus on delivering better designs.

Features:
- Save an existing product description
- Copy previously saved product description to new and existing designs
- Supports Create/Edit Multiple Product Page
- Quickly Select All Colors on the Multiple Product Page

Whats New:
- Beta Release of Copy and Paste, Price and Color (Free while in beta)


Notice of Non-Affiliation and Disclaimer:

We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Merch by Amazon, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. The official Merch by Amazon website can be found at https://merch.amazon.com.
